body_html:
You might want to do the same for python true division, that is special cased in register_prim_ops

I think the semantics are the same for division between a float & an int in python as in c++: the int gets promoted to a float and a float is returned.

body:
> You might want to do the same for python true division, that is special cased in register_prim_ops

I think the semantics are the same for division between a float & an int in python as in c++: the int gets promoted to a float and a float is returned.
